title: The Thief of Todays and Tomorrows
description: After a whirlwind wartime romance and marriage, Francis and Katie DeLucia are sure that their future will be perfect. When Francis returns home at the end of WWII though, he encounters a job and housing market crowded with other returning veterans. Desperate to support his growing family, Francis accepts a job from a suspected Mob boss.Katie, Francis’s young Irish wife, does her best to support her husband’s choices, defending him to her family and trying to become the perfect partner for him. When she begins to realize just what her husband may be doing to support them though, she makes a life-altering choice.Set in Chicago at a time when other neighborhoods might as well have been foreign countries, this novel of consequences will pull you into Francis and Katie’s world and leave you wondering how the minor choices you make today will change your future.Novel approx. 91,000 words.Cover art by Nikki McBroom (nikkimcbroom@cox.net)This is Susan Wells Bennett’s first novel. Prior to becoming a novelist, she was a writer and editor for a national homebuilder.
author: Susan Wells Bennett
